# repo Provider

Hashicups: Example Hashicups through Speakeasy

## Example Usage

```terraform
terraform {
  required_providers {
    twst = {
      source  = "test/twst"
      version = "0.7.0"
    }
  }
}

provider "twst" {
  # Configuration options
}
```
